titleStmt.title: Shufling, cutting, and dealing, in a game at pickquet: being acted from the year, 1653. to 1658. By O.P. and others; with great applause.
titleStmt.author: Neville, Henry, 1620-1694.

notesStmt.note: A political satire in form of a play.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
